CS:S is easily the blandest CStrike game. Its interface is poorly made, the hit detection is horrible and it is really hard to enjoy because of all the "hardcore" players that will kill you with headshots from the other side of the map. Not to mention the community: Russian/German kids run rampant spraying porn and blasting shitty trance music through their mic's. The only thing this game is great for is the mods, such as zombie escape and gun game as they are fun in small doses.

If you want to enjoy vanilla Counter-Strike, get Global Offensive. Its interface is far more user-friendly, it's far simpler to get into a game and actually feels polished. Hell, they even got voice actors for each of the different factions so you don't get to hear Jess Cliffe yelling "Fire in the hole!" every two seconds.

Counter-Strike: Source is first person shooting game that can be played with friends or played alone. With multiple gamemodes  and maps, there is much to enjoy in a game like this. Create your own custom loadout with equipment and weaponry to take down the enemy and achieve victory. Be on the Merciless Terrorists team, or save innocents, and join up with the Counter-Terrorists.

My Overall rating  -  8/10
